song.title: Windows Illusion (Savez-vous Planter Windows?)
song.info:
By *Maf* & *Tnk*
Original zik by maf, delirious version by tnk.
With big kisses 4 CORINNE and MURIEL.
C'est lent ! Ça plante tout le temps ! C'est... Houinedoze!!!
Dos viruscan initied, Windows found: Delete (Y/y) ?
My computer science teacher asked: - Why is a Pentium better than a 286? My answer: - Try to run Quake on a 286 !!!
Après jardin-illusion, -+Windows-illusion+-
maf&tnk________07/1997
